data.text: @StackhouseNCME @newscentermaine Seriously a great place for a spontaneous sinkhole…our collective IQ would suddenly rebound.
@StackhouseNCME @newscentermaine Shhhhhhh… don’t tell them it’s all over, and no one cares about their indignation for what was….
@StackhouseNCME @newscentermaine What are the current Maine COVID restrictions they want to be lifted? It feels like there aren't many left...
